languages.text: "Когда придет время, Идира. Когда придет время".
"When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."
languages.original_text: "Когда придет время, Идира. Когда придет время".

traits.locale_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."

languages.text: “等时机成熟，伊迪拉。等时机成熟。”
languages.original_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."

traits.locale_text: “等时机成熟，伊迪拉。等时机成熟。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Quand le moment sera venu, Idira. Quand le moment sera venu... »
languages.original_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."

traits.locale_text: « Quand le moment sera venu, Idira. Quand le moment sera venu... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Cuando llegue el momento, Idira. Cuando llegue el momento».
languages.original_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando llegue el momento, Idira. Cuando llegue el momento».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「しかるべき時があるのだ、イディラ。しかるべき時に話す」
languages.original_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."

traits.locale_text: 「しかるべき時があるのだ、イディラ。しかるべき時に話す」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Alles zur rechten Zeit, Idira. Alles zur rechten Zeit."
languages.original_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."

traits.locale_text: "Alles zur rechten Zeit, Idira. Alles zur rechten Zeit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "When the time is right, Idira. When the time is right."
